name: Winter lodge
description:
Welcome to the winter lodge!

IMPORTANT: DUE TO A PROBLEM WITH WEBGL AND URP (UNIVERSIAL RENDER PIPELINE (FOR LIGHTS IN THIS PROJECT)) IT ONLY WORKS WITHOUT THIS RENDERING PIPELINE IN THE BROWSER. WOULD BE NICE IF YOU COULD USE THE WINDOWS VERSION TO FULLY ENJOY THE GAME.

This is a tiny interactive game to relax and chill. I made this game for the "Winter Scene Jam". 

Use the WASD keys to move and the mouse to interact with some objects. For a better experience use your headphones if you have some.

I hope you enjoy it!
